A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a great movie and it's a shame not everyone sees it. Yes\, it is more challenging than TFA\, but why is that a bad thing?? It's a better movie\, and with that often comes a more divisive reception i suppose. It is uncliched\, beautiful\, emotional\, and IMO a film that captures the spirit of star wars better than any previous post ROTJ film. Boom. Go see it y'all.
